name: Set session cookies
description: Save authentication tokens as session cookies.

arguments.name: Access token
arguments.description: Access tokens are the most common way to authenticate with a server.

arguments.name: Expires in
arguments.description: (Optional) Time in seconds until the token expires. Defaults to 3600 (1 hour). This should be left blank for JWTs.

Success.description: This event is triggered once the tokens have been saved.

Error.description: This event is triggered if Nordcraft is unable to set the session cookies.
